fontSize.$description: breadcrumb.item.fontSize — Breadcrumb item font size (14px). Standard size for secondary navigation text.

active.$description: breadcrumb.item.fontWeight.active — Active (current page) breadcrumb item font weight. Medium weight distinguishes current page from ancestor links.

default.$description: breadcrumb.item.fontWeight.default — Default breadcrumb item font weight. Regular weight for ancestor/link items.

lineHeight.$description: breadcrumb.item.lineHeight — Breadcrumb item line height. Compact line height for single-line navigation.

horizontal.$description: breadcrumb.item.padding.horizontal — Horizontal padding around breadcrumb items (4px). Subtle padding increases click/tap area without changing visual spacing.

vertical.$description: breadcrumb.item.padding.vertical — Vertical padding on breadcrumb items (4px). Increases touch target height for better mobile usability.

fontSize.$description: breadcrumb.separator.fontSize — Separator font size (14px). Matches item font size for visual consistency.

margin.$description: breadcrumb.separator.margin — Horizontal margin around separator (8px). Space between breadcrumb items and separator character.
